rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a reception area that opens into a living space.
Spacious living room designed in Chettinad style with traditional elements and floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light. Features a central area perfect for family gatherings.
Well-equipped kitchen designed in Chettinad style with built-in storage and traditional cooking elements.
Dining room adjacent to the living area for a seamless flow between spaces.
Entertainment space with soundproofing and ambient lighting, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall to maintain brightness when needed.
Dedicated private gym area designed for optimum exercise space with built-in equipment storage.
